title: Perfectly preserved dinosaur embryo found in China
description: Researchers say the fossil is at least 66 million years old and was about to hatch just like a chicken.

title: Schumacher named Ferrari reserve driver
description: Mick Schumacher will combine his race seat at Haas in 2022 with a role as Ferrari's reserve driver.

title: Quiz of the Year, part two: What was in the news last spring?
description: How well do you remember the news of the past 12 months?

title: Covid: Rishi Sunak announces £1bn fund for businesses
description: It comes as pubs and restaurants struggle with reduced footfall and cancellations amid Covid fears.

title: Omicron: Andrew Lloyd Webber halts Cinderella musical until February
description: The West End musical will return "as soon as this wave is licked", the composer and producer says.

title: No new Covid rules for England before Christmas
description: But Boris Johnson says "we can't rule out any further measures after Christmas" as Omicron spreads fast.

title: Malaysia hit by the worst floods in decades
description: At least 14 people have died and tens of thousands evacuated their homes after torrential rain.

title: OnlyFans founder is making way for firm's marketing chief
description: The founder of the content subscription site is stepping aside to focus on new endeavours.

title: Covid: No new measures in England before Christmas and Sunak sets out help for Covid-hit firms
description: Five things you need to know about the coronavirus pandemic this Tuesday evening.

title: England's Archer ruled out until summer after second operation on elbow
description: England fast bowler Jofra Archer is ruled out until the summer after having a second operation on his long-standing right elbow injury.

title: Celtic & Motherwell want winter break brought forward to avoid capped capacities
description: Celtic and Motherwell request the Scottish Premiership winter break is brought forward to avoid festive fixtures being impacted by capped capacities.

title: Omicron: Sandringham Royal watchers will miss seeing the Queen
description: Royal watchers will miss seeing the monarch at Sandringham but back her decision to stay away.

title: Why no team is in control of Premier League title race - Shearer analysis
description: Manchester City are top of the Premier League at Christmas but Liverpool and Chelsea are still right in the title race, says MOTD pundit Alan Shearer.

title: Covid passports: Club owner's mum gives out lateral flow tests all night
description: Rich Gilbert says 30% of people arriving at his nightclub didn't know they needed a Covid passport.

title: Gibbons responsible for fall that left Tylicki paralysed, judge rules
description: Former jockey Graham Gibbons was responsible for the fall that left fellow jockey Freddy Tylicki paralysed from the waist down, a judge has ruled.

title: Harvey Parker: Police release CCTV images of missing student
description: Harvey Parker, 20, who has autism, was last seen leaving Heaven nightclub near Charing Cross.

title: Hogmanay events cancelled as Covid rules tightened in Scotland
description: Outdoor events including football matches will be limited to 500 people, and indoor to a maximum of 200.

title: Seal pup freed from hole after three-hour rescue in Norfolk
description: Rescuers say the animal was "really jammed" and at risk of drowning at high tide.

title: Scottish sport to be 'effectively spectator-free' over festive period
description: Festive sport in Scotland will be "effectively spectator-free" as the government continues the fight against Covid-19's Omicron variant.

title: Police Federation chair John Apter suspended over sexual touching claims
description: The police watchdog has started an independent investigation over sexual misconduct claims.

title: 'England look even worse than on the last Ashes tour'
description: Geoff Lemon says Australians are perplexed by an England team that may be heading for a more crushing Ashes defeat than four years ago.

title: The Afghans building a new life in the Hebrides
description: Frishta Matin and her family risked their lives to flee the Taliban for a new start in Lewis.

title: Big Ben will bong again to see in the new year
description: The Elizabeth Tower, which houses the bell and famous clock, has undergone four years of repairs.

title: Omicron: Will schools be open in January?
description: A number of schools across the UK are preparing to switch to online learning after Christmas.

title: Downing Street gatherings: What were the Covid rules at the time?
description: Several alleged gatherings are being investigated by a senior civil servant.

title: Princess Haya: The princess, the sheikh and the £550m divorce settlement
description: A UK court publishes a ruling in the divorce case of Sheikh Mohammed and his ex-wife Princess Haya.

title: Alt-J's Thom Sonny Green: From shielding to getting back on tour
description: Thom Sonny Green says the risk of catching Covid is worth it to get back on stage.

title: Christmas restrictions: 'I don't have a turkey in the fridge'
description: With just four days until Christmas, people are wondering if new restrictions will be brought in.

title: The Matrix's real-world legacy - from red pill incels to conspiracies and deepfakes
description: As The Matrix returns, we explore the enduring legacy of the franchise in culture, tech and beyond.

title: Coronavirus treatments: What progress is being made?
description: Medical teams around the world are learning which medicines work best against Covid.

title: Largest-ever millipede fossil found on Northumberland beach
description: It is thought to have been more than 2.5m long and lived 326 million years ago in Northumberland.

title: Berlusconi seeks comeback role as Italian president
description: Despite the scandals and a tax fraud conviction, Italy's most colourful ex-PM could be head of state.

title: Omicron: South African scientists probe link between variants and untreated HIV
description: Covid variants may be mutating inside people with suppressed immunity.

title: Why China could win the new global arms race
description: China has a long-term plan to rival the world's biggest military powers.

title: 'Wonderful' to give back after childhood poverty
description: Amanda Paget is drawing on her experiences as a child to provide festive food for families in need.

title: Indian Christians fear attacks or jail over conversions
description: Christians in Karnataka state say attacks against them have grown ahead of a new anti-conversion law.
